name: MEC H2O 2mm Neoprene Gloves - Unisex
description: Get a firm grip on your paddle or handlebars. With synthetic leather on the palms and sticky silicone on the fingers, these great all-around paddling or cold-weather cycling gloves offer mid-range warmth and a high-end feel.Backs are 2mm stretch neoprene with polyester jersey for warmth.Clarino (synthetic leather) palms for excellent paddle feel and great abrasion resistance and blister prevention.Sticky hexagon-patterned silicone on fingers improves grip.Reinforced at high-wear areas like the tops of the palms and inside of thumbs.Velcro® closure.
